text: Beethoven Concerto () is a 1936 Soviet movie directed by Mikhail Gavronsky and Vladimir Schmidtgof.КОНЦЕРТ БЕТХОВЕНА It stars Mark Taimanov, Borya Vasilyev, and Vladimir Gardin. == Cast == * Mark Taimanov as Yanka Malevich * Borya Vasilyev as Vladek Korsak * Vladimir Gardin as Prof. Malevich * Lyudmila Shabalina as Jenya * Aleksandr Larikov as Korsak (as A. Larikov) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1936 movies
title: Beethoven Concerto
